casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, U.S. Bank Trust National Association, Alexander Burns, Heartland Family Group, LLC, and Glenn Weber, Defendants Below, Appellants,
v.
Charles David WOOD, Jr. and DNIC Insurance Holdings, Inc., Individually and Derivatively on Behalf of Lonestar Holdco, LLC, Plaintiffs Below, Appellees. No. 549, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: October 26, 2018
Decided: November 5, 2018

REFUSED.
